label: 寺主
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: [Also teraju.]  One position within the sangō, or cabinet of administrators, which administered the fiscal affairs of a temple.　[三綱]　[Read じしゅmainly in Enryakuji, and てらじゅin Ninnaji. Also read てらじ]
